content.rendered:
Directed by Gil Ho Ahn.

Written by Kim Eun-sook.

Cast Lee Do-Hyun( Joo Yeo-Jung 1) . Ji-Yeon Lim( Park Yeon-Jin 1) . Jona Xiao( Park Yeon-Jin 1) . Aria Song( Moon Dong-Eun1) . Harrison Xu( Joo Yeo-Jung 1) . Sung-Hoon Park( Jeon Jae-Jun 1) . Yeom Hye-ran( Kang Hyun-Nam 1) . Sung-Il Jung( Ha Do-Young 1) . Kim Hieora( Lee Sa-Ra 1) . Joo-Young Cha( Choi Hye-Jeong 1) . Kim Gun-woo( Son Myeong-o1) . Blake Kennedy( Ha Ye Sol 1) . Kim Jeong-yeong( Park Sang-Im 1) . Jung Ji-so( Moon Dong-Eun (young)). Anzu Lawson( Dong-Eun’s Mother). George Tsai( Jeon Jae-Jun). Christian T. Chan( Ha Do-Young). Victoria Grace( Park Yeon-Jin (young)). Ye-Eun Shin( Park Yeon-Jin (young)). Eugene Ko( Su Han) .Series Music by .Jun-seok Kim .Series Cinematography by .Jong-Kyoung Jang .Series Sound Department .Guy Arad .Evania Wijaya .Series Visual Effects by .Jinhee Kim .Sung-min Alvin Yun .Series Additional Crew .Riccardo Mimmi .See also .Release Dates | Official Sites | Company Credits | Filming & Production | Technical Specs .Getting Started | Contributor Zone » .Contribute to This Page .Edit page.Top Gap.Answer.See more gaps ».Add episode.The Glory (TV Series) .Details .Full Cast and Crew.Release Dates.Official Sites.Company Credits.Filming & Production.Technical Specs .Storyline .Taglines.Plot Summary.Synopsis.Plot Keywords.Parents Guide .Did You Know? .Trivia.Goofs.Crazy Credits.Quotes.Alternate Versions.Connections.Soundtracks .Photo & Video .Photo Gallery.Trailers and Videos .Opinion .Awards.FAQ.User Reviews.User Ratings.External Reviews.Metacritic Reviews .TV .Episode List .Related Items .News.External Sites .Explore More.Show Less.Create a list » .User Lists .Related lists from IMDb users .list image.Korean Series .a list of 41 titles.created 01 Jan 2022 .list image.To-Watch Series .a list of 30 titles.created 3 months ago .list image.fav .a list of 39 titles.created 10 months ago .list image.Series .a list of 37 titles.created 20 Jun 2020 .list image.To watch .a list of 25 titles.created 5 days ago .See all related lists ».Share this page: .Clear your history .Recently Viewed .Get the IMDb App.Sign in for more accessSign in for more access .Get the IMDb App.Help.Site Index.IMDbPro.Box Office Mojo.IMDb Developer .Press Room.Advertising.Jobs.Conditions of Use.Privacy Policy.Your Ads Privacy Choices .Â© 1990-2023 by IMDb.com, Inc.
